channel.title: Quantity Text & Color
channel.description:
[img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/7656/3212.png[/img]
I have two clients; One of the right is an edited deob by Shortyz & The one on the left is iClarity v1.
I want to iClarity's To Look like the deob (colored). And if you look carefully the font is different; There isnt a black outline on the colored one; I want that to.

item.title: Quantity Text & Color
item.dc:creator: @vengscape vengscape
item.description:
@vengscape wrote:

This error is mainly in your client.java file.
Text colours are arranged in a different order eg.
j1 = s etc

You will have to find the pixel grabber for each item and embed the code in there.
You might aswell download another client to be honest.
Any Hope this helps

Read full topic
